name: Firewall TD
description:
Hello!

This is a simple educational tower defense that uses realistic ACL commands instead of towers.

I enjoy exploring the concept of educational games, so I like to make them to test systems I want to use in other projects.

This was built to test some ideas I had for tower defense spawn management and an in-game terminal.

I also wanted to try out using a restrictive color palette, this one only has two colors.

Thanks for playing!

----

If you deal with IT/Cyber in any capacity, you may have noticed some weird things about this game.

For example the first octet of every IP address is above 225. Like other cyber-based games, Uplink for example, I chose to have no real world routable IP addresses in the game.

Some command functionality is also not exactly as expected. That is primarily due to time constraints and a quick 'How important is this to the game' check.

If you notice anything really, really bad that I missed please let me know and I will see if I can add it in an update!

---

Color Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/1bit-monitor-glow

Font: https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font

Engine: Godot 3.4.4

All other assets created by me in Aseprite.
